metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1088 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.Description: iproute2 before 3.3.0 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary file used by (1) configure or (2) examples/dhcp-client-script.

notes.Note: tyhicks> Issues are in the configure script and an example script, which doesn't seem to be used anywhere.

criterions.comment: iproute2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.0-2').
